level.heading: License required.
level.text: A nurse staffing agency shall be licensed by the Department before providing or referring any nursing personnel, Home Health Aides, or Personal Care Aides to a health care facility or agency, or to an individual, for the purpose of rendering temporary nursing services or related aide services within the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-74
level.text: For Law 15-74, see notes following ยง 44-1051.02.
